Title: TabStrip ASP.NET WebControl & Tab Image Builder Tool
Description: An ASP.NET tab control which renders as a styled unordered list ( <ul> ). A tool for creating the tab images is also included, and you can add your own as well.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An ASP.NET tab control which renders as a styled unordered list ( <ul> ). A tool for creating the tab images is also included, and you can add your own as well.

Features
  • Design-Time support
  • Mouseover Effects
  • Web Accessable (Reverts to an ordinary Unordered List when stylesheet is disabled)
  • Search Engine friendly
  • API for dynamic manipulation
  • Flexibile look and feel with the ability to add your own images
  • Image generation tool provided for creating a variety of images
